Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.22.Varicella"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.22.Varicella

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.22.Varicella

title: IMMZ.DT.22.Varicella

status: draft

date: 2023-08-02 04:40:13+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated against Varicella

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT22

action

title: Immunize Patient for Varicella- No Doses

description: Provide Varicella immunizations – using the "Varicella vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Varicella vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Varicella vaccine because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 12text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Varicella vaccine because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pregnancy Status" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Varicella vaccine because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Country recognizes Varicella an important public health burden" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Varicella vaccine because no doses in a 2 dose scheme

definition: IMMZ.DT.22.Varicella.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Varicella - 1st dose given between 4 weeks and 3 months ago

description: Provide Varicella immunizations – using the "Varicella vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Varicella vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Varicella vaccine because 1 dose given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Varicella dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Varicella vaccine because 1 dose given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Pregnancy Status" = FALSEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with Varicella vaccine because 1 dose given 4 weeks ago in a 2 dose scheme
